supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-19 (in mm), (1) 19 x 32, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 30 x 38, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 55 x 23, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 48 x 16, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 59 x 15, (A) traces of 9 lines (?), (B) blank, (6) 51 x 32, (A) traces of 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 24 x 27, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (8) 29 x 17, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 32 x 9, (A) traces of 3 (?) lines, (B) blank, (10) 23 x 10, (A) traces of 3 lines, (B) blank, (11) 27 x 18, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 20 x 21, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 19 x 15, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 22 x 27, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (15) 54 x 56, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) traces, (16) 69 x 26, (A) 6 lines, left margin, vertical and horizontal lines in grid pattern, (B) blank, (17) 59 x 14, (A) 2 lines, 5 horizontal lines, no margins, (B) traces of 4 lines, (18) 80 x 36, (A) traces of 2 lines, traces of right margin of six lines, vertical and horizontal lines in grid pattern, (B) blank, (19) 32 x 53, (A) 2 cols., col.i, 3 lines, top right margins, col.ii, 1 line, top left margins, (B) blank

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
